tasks.name: Increase Linux open file limit in Drill containers
tasks.text_content: I recommend a new limit of something like 10k - 100k.  This limit is implemented in the kernel, which raises a question about whether it can be set from inside a container.  Presumably if the container is granted the needed capabilities it can change its own open file limit.
tasks.description: I recommend a new limit of something like 10k - 100k.  This limit is implemented in the kernel, which raises a question about whether it can be set from inside a container.  Presumably if the container is granted the needed capabilities it can change its own open file limit.

tasks.name: Prevent Users from Running Non-Data Queries in Front End
tasks.text_content:
For security reasons, we should disallow users from running queries that would expose sensitive information and other metadata.  Specific queries to prohibit are:
CREATE TABLE AS
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE AS
CREATE VIEW 
CREATE SCHEMA
DROP TABLE/VIEW/SCHEMA
SHOW DATABASES (or anything really)
INSERT / UPSERT
SELECT <fields> FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA
EXPLAIN PLAN FOR
ALTER SYSTEM
SET
Basically, we want to disallow any queries that could expose metadata, allow users to alter system or session settings, or anything else that would be a security hazard. 

These queries should be allowed in the query runner, just now in the query text editor.

tasks.name: Environments Work
tasks.text_content: Create a deployable lab infrastructure using terraform and docker containers.
tasks.description: Create a deployable lab infrastructure using terraform and docker containers.

tasks.name: OCI Deployability
tasks.text_content: Make the entire application deployable on Oracles cloud
tasks.description: Make the entire application deployable on Oracles cloud

tasks.name: Libpostal Dependency
tasks.text_content:
Address Parser UDF will have dependencies on the Libpostal C libraries and associated data files as well as JPostal. The data files will also need to be refreshed periodically.

Libpostal: https://github.com/openvenues/libpostal
Jpostal: https://github.com/openvenues/jpostal
